txt.en: 'Saruman isn't just mining iron ore down here, [placeholder]... there are other things as well, but I can't quite figure out what it is that he is after.\n\n'If you could get me a few samples of that ore, I will take a closer look at it and see if I can determine what it is.'
'Well done. I will need as much of this ore as you can bring me, so if you happen to come across more, bring it here.'
Ondor wants to know what the Orcs are mining in this cave. Saruman must have some use for the strange minerals they are digging up.
Ore can be found throughout the Orc-mines.\n\nOndor the Dwarf asked you to bring him some of the mysterious ore the Orcs are mining.
Bring the ore to Ondor in the Orc-mines
Ondor the Dwarf is in the Orc-mines.\n\nYou should bring the ore you collected to Ondor.
